subsection_name: benh-giun-dua.json_7_Subjects at risk of developing ascariasis
subsection_content: Age: children under 10 years old are susceptible to roundworm disease because they are more active and dirty; Climate: in hot and humid tropical climates, worm eggs are favorable for development; Poor hygiene: in rural areas in developing countries, public toilets are often used, non-modern toilets... so pathogens can easily spread.; Living habits: some farmers use human feces as fertilizer, causing the disease to spread more; Eat fresh food: People who have the habit of eating food that is not thoroughly washed, raw meat... are also at risk of infection.
subsection_title: benh giun dua.json. Subjects at risk of developing ascariasis
subsection_data:
benh giun dua.json. Subjects at risk of developing ascariasis
Age: children under 10 years old are susceptible to roundworm disease because they are more active and dirty; Climate: in hot and humid tropical climates, worm eggs are favorable for development; Poor hygiene: in rural areas in developing countries, public toilets are often used, non-modern toilets... so pathogens can easily spread.; Living habits: some farmers use human feces as fertilizer, causing the disease to spread more; Eat fresh food: People who have the habit of eating food that is not thoroughly washed, raw meat... are also at risk of infection.
